DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Deep Inferior Epigastric Perforator Flap Program
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study analyze institution 's experience start subspecialized DIEP flap program determine whether hospital would benefit instituting similar program . Prior study compare outcome DIEP flap program TRAM flap within center . Other study calculate cost DIEP flap complication rate . However , one examine overall effect subspecialized reconstruction program impact health center . In study , determine institutionalization DIEP flap program increase center 's rate breast reconstruction , well evaluate outcome overall financial viability .
